sentences.en: A number of products have been developed which are permeable to air and water.
sentences.cn: 已开发出许多可渗水透气的产品。

sentences.en: Alleys are being rebuilt or renewed with permeable permeable payment pavement.
sentences.cn: 目前,小巷在重新修葺或者建造重建成透气性的路面.

sentences.en: An osmotic mutant of Neurospora was permeable to polymers of molecular weight 18500.
sentences.cn: 脉孢壳属的渗透突变体能透过分子量为18500的聚合物.

sentences.en: As dilatation occurs, capillaries become abnormally permeable to proteins.
sentences.cn: 随着扩张的发生, 毛细血管对蛋白变得异常地易于渗透.

sentences.en: Cause of Tuscan wines " permeable fast because the sizing of paper. "
sentences.cn: 造成酒标透水快的原因是纸张的施胶度较差.

sentences.en: Cell permeable, potent protein phosphatase inhibitor. Apoptosis inducer. Mixture of two isomers.
sentences.cn: 细胞渗透 、 有效的蛋白磷酸酶抑制剂. 凋亡诱导剂. 两种异构体的混合物.

sentences.en: Fabric hygroscopicity good, with no sense of wet, gas - permeable clothing, and comfort.
sentences.cn: 织物吸湿性好, 且无潮湿感, 服装透水气性好, 穿着舒适.

sentences.en: Sift the anthers onto unglazed, permeable paper, such as newspaper or paper toweling, for drying.
sentences.cn: 将花药筛到无光的 、 具渗透性的纸上, 如报纸或卫生纸, 以便花药干燥.

sentences.en: Springwater is clean, since it has been filtered permeable rocks.
sentences.cn: 泉水很干净, 因为是由具有渗透性的岩石过滤的.

sentences.en: The accumulation of oilis governed by lateral changes from permeable to impermeable facies.
sentences.cn: 石油的储集是受从渗透到不渗透的岩相横向变化控制的.

sentences.en: The living cells ( cell membranes ) of potato is selectively permeable.
sentences.cn: 因活的马铃薯细胞 ( 细胞膜 ) 是选透性的.

sentences.en: The skin of amphibians is permeable to water.
sentences.cn: 两栖动物的皮肤是透水的。

sentences.en: The waste material is placed in cells with permeable membranes.
sentences.cn: 废液置于有渗透膜的槽中.

sentences.en: Therefore, apply cement asphalt paste to permeable pavement have practicability.
sentences.cn: 就整体而言, 水泥沥青胶浆应用于透水性铺面具有可行性.

sentences.en: This simulates the fractionation of components across a semi - permeable membrane.
sentences.cn: 该 功能模拟 混合物流过半渗透膜后的分离情况.

words.tran_cn: 渗透性；透磁率，导磁系数；弥漫
渗透；[化学] 渗透作用；散布性

trans.tran_en: material that is permeable allows water, gas etc to pass through it
